message: I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This allows for a better balance considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I'll give you a fair 60/40 split, but I'm hoping we can do better than that.
Considering the inflation, I suggest an equal split of the remaining funds. This ensures fairness and maximizes our collective gains given the diminishing value of money.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slight advantage, but I'm not budging much more than that.
